messages.title: Change
messages.content: Vote for Melanie Hampton in Mitcham and Morden

keyPolicies.policyTitle: TAX ON JOBS WILL KILL THE RECOVERY
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery. Conservatives will stop the jobs tax.
Conservatives promise to increase spending every year.
Melanie's plan for Mitcham town centre.

issues.economy: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery.
issues.governance: Melanie's plan for regenerating Mitcham town centre includes investing in local people.
issues.health: Conservatives will increase NHS spending every year.

housing.content: Melanie's plan for Mitcham town centre.

leaflet.personalStatement: Melanie changed Labour's mind and convinced them to keep the Wilson hospital open.

politicalExperience.achievements: Keeping the Wilson hospital open, supporting local businesses and schools.

endorsements.endorsement: Delivered a new library for Pollards Hill.

quotes.text: We must support our local shops and businesses as we emerge from recession.
